mlabel.text: Select the appropriate Extra-Thematic FE that is missing in the frame structure, but present in the sentence being annotated.
Use the next text box to type in the missing FE, if it is not among the ones listed in the drop down menu above.
Use the next box to insert general comments about this annotation set.
Use the next box to add a note about the occurrence of some particular constructional phenomenon that influences the annotation.
